video.title: Taiyou no ouji Horusu no daibouken
video.synopsis: Marking the debut of anime creator Isao Takahata, this epic tells the story of Horus, a Scandinavian hero entrusted with the magic Sword of the Sun.

episodes.synopsis: Marking the debut of anime creator Isao Takahata, this epic tells the story of Horus, a Scandinavian hero entrusted with the magic Sword of the Sun.
episodes.title: Little Norse Prince Valiant
